findings.title: Incorrect tracking of token distribution across phases
findings.description: ICNQCrowdsale uses token.totalSupply() to enforce caps on token tranches, but this intent is violated because totalSupply carries over from each phase to the next, causing premature ending of phases.

findings.title: Burning unsold tokens by minting them to 0x0 unnecessarily inflates ICNQ's total supply
findings.description: Minting unsold tokens to 0x0 address unnecessarily increases ICNQ's total token supply, as finalization already stops further token minting.

findings.title: Badly Named Variable
findings.description: The variable 'tokensIncludingBonus' on line ICNQToken.sol:142 is poorly named and should be renamed to something like 'bonusTokens'.
